snippet: Stevie Johnson, the Bills’ top receiver, was held out of practice because of a groin injury, leaving his status uncertain for the team’s season-opening game at the Jets on Sunday.
abstract: Buffalo Bills receiver Stevie Johnson suffers a groin injury, leaving his status uncertain for the team’s season-opening game against the New York Jets; other football items noted.
lead_paragraph: Stevie Johnson, the Bills’ top receiver, was held out of practice because of a groin injury, leaving his status uncertain for the team’s season-opening game at the Jets on Sunday.

headline.main: Status of Bills Receiver Is Uncertain
headline.print_headline: Status of Bills Receiver Is Uncertain
